channel.title: Guides & Tutorials on darktable user manual

item.title: other resources
item.description: The official places to obtain information concerning darktable are the following: Official website (darktable.org) darktable github wiki The following articles provide some useful background information on the darktable scene-referred workflow: darktable 3.0 for dummies in 3 modules darktable 3.0 for dummies – hardcore edition darktable 3.0: RGB or Lab? Which modules? Help! The following resources are very useful in deeper understanding the functionality of various modules in darktable:
